text: Why the Swallow Has the Tail with Little Horns () is a 1967 Soviet animated movie directed by Amen Khaydarov.ПОЧЕМУ У ЛАСТОЧКИ ХВОСТ РОЖКАМИ (1967)Почему у ласточки хвостик рожками (1967) The movie is based upon the traditional Kazakh fairy tale of the same name. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1967 movies Category:1960s animated movies Category:Soviet animated movies
title: Why the Swallow Has the Tail with Little Horns
